resources.string: Press on color below to apply
Use inverted layout for navbar buttons
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Use gradient color as a scale for the battery level
Show media cover art as the lockscreen background
Display negociated charger max current and voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Change the default font of the lockscreen clock widget
Display 4G icon in signal icon instead LTE
Always display battery percentage when charging
Show toggle for adaptive brightness near the slider
When the screen is off, long-pressing the volume keys will seek music tracks
Press volume keys to wake your device
Wake up the device if charger is plugged/unplugged
Double tap anywhere on the lockscreen to put phone to sleep
Double tap on the status bar to put the device to sleep
Swipe down with three fingers to take a screenshot
Default android system gesture and control
Custom charging symbol for text style
Custom charging symbol near battery percentage text
Show the network traffic indicator arrows
Enables reboot option in power menu
Enables the advanced reboot menu for rebooting options
Enables screenshot option in power menu
Enables flashlight option in power menu
Enables Airplane mode option in power menu
Enable the ability to show and use the power menu dialog while on the lockscreen
Show the reboot option on the lockscreen
Show the advanced reboot option on the lockscreen
Show the screenshot option on the lockscreen
Show the airplane mode option on the lockscreen
Show a notification when the battery is fully charged
Smart Charging allows you to set maximum charging level to extend the lifespan of your battery
Display the app\'s icon corresponding with the toast
Enable to display logo in the status bar
Display the cross sign next to signal bar when data is disabled
Use a custom image for QS header
Select an image from pre-installed image collections
Select an image from internal storage
Allow to use Home button when device is ringing
Enable backlight with timeout only on button touch
Prevent interaction with navigation buttons while the screen is being touched
Toggle the visibility of icons in statusbar
Display VoLTE icon (Needs a SystemUI restart to take effect)
Show spacer above settings actionbar for easier use with one hand\nNOTE: restart settings app to see effect
blurs darkened background behind quick settings
Hide smart replies to save screen space with peeking notifications
Useful if the device actually has rounded corners
Allow apps to bypass security systems by pretending to be a different app.
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
Disable heads up in these applications
Disable heads up for these applications
Unlock device with fingerprint after reboot or lockdown
Show a dialog when an application crashes
Show mobile type icon on top of the signal indicator
Enter a custom label. Leave blank to use your network name
Change the default font of the lockscreen clock widget
Change the default font of the lockscreen date widget
Replace clear all text with nice button
Show clear all notifications button in quick settings instead of default text one
Display status bar on the lockscreen
Controls whether the navigation bar is displayed
Show a kill app button in the notification\'s longpress menu
Whether to show R style notification headers (Requires a SystemUI restart)
Allow accessing quick settings on secure lockscreen
Enable to vibrate after call connect
Enable to vibrate while call is on waiting
Enable to vibrate after call disconnect
Save battery by shutting off extra pixels
Enable with battery saver to increase power savings
Show visualizer bars while playing music
Block screen and button inputs when device is in pocket
Listen for fingerprint when pocket detection is active
Block access to certain sensors for some apps to save battery
Significant motion, accelerometer, linear acceleration sensors will be blocked for these apps
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss
Blocking alarms have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss.
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for 1 minute
Swiping up on peeking notifications will snooze heads up from that application for %d minutes
Show heads up only for dialer, messaging and alarm app
Force apps that support expanded notifications
Display a fancy animation when the device is charging
Automatically turn on for these apps
Gaming mode will turn on automatically when these apps are opened and turn off when they are closed
Block all headsup notifications except calls & alarms
Block all headsup notifications except alarms
Block all headsup notifications except messaging
Block all headsup notifications except calls
Disable hardware buttons when Gaming mode is turned on
Lock screen brightness when Gaming mode is turned on
Try detecting and adding gaming apps automatically
Block notifications sound & vibration when Gaming mode is turned on
Configure service to enable weather details
Find and install new icon packs from App Store
Note\u003a you can install new icon packs from play store by searching for \"Chronus icons\"
Display weather info next to date
Display weather next to date instead big widget
Show temp with scale and image
Show temp with image without scale
Display text at bottom of QS panel
Set to empty for default CraftWithHeart
In order to add your own icon, select the top left icon and use the OnePlus 6T FP Customizer app to select the icon you want.
Shows an animation while reading your finger
Enable dual row statusbar for notifications\nNOTE: restart SystemUI for see effect
Jump to camera gesture is now disabled
Set QS background color from Wallpaper

Enable the new QS tint style
Disable expanding quick settings on secure lock screens
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Always show Quick Settings on status bar pulldown
Open quick settings when there are %1$s notifications
Open quick settings when there are no notifications
When using swipe up home navigation to open recents, only stock recents are supported
Enable to use an alternative recents screen
Customize the additional settings for slim recents
Clear recents by long-pressing the memory bar
Apply a custom icon pack for apps in the panel
Show recent apps panel on the left edge of the screen
Apps to not show in the panel
Tap here to add, tap on added app to remove it
Show app shortcuts on the other edge
Choose apps to show in the sidebar

Reduce recents opening lag by disabling this
Show a progress bar displaying RAM
Show notifications ticker-style in status bar
Display lock icon on the lockscreen
QS analog style (Need QS Clock 11, 12 or 13)
Light up the side edges of the screen on notification pulse
Keep showing on always on display. Until the screen is turned on
